text.zh: 耶和华是我的牧者，我必不至缺乏。
text.en: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

text.zh: 我靠着那加给我力量的，凡事都能做。
text.en: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

text.zh: 神爱世人，甚至将他的独生子赐给他们，叫一切信他的，不至灭亡，反得永生。
text.en: For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life.

text.zh: 你们要先求他的国和他的义，这些东西都要加给你们了。
text.en: But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things shall be added to you.

text.zh: 应当一无挂虑，只要凡事借着祷告、祈求和感谢，将你们所要的告诉神。
text.en: Be anxious for nothing, but in everything by prayer and supplication, with thanksgiving, let your requests be made known to God.

text.zh: 你的话是我脚前的灯，是我路上的光。
text.en: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

text.zh: 我们晓得万事都互相效力，叫爱神的人得益处，就是按他旨意被召的人。
text.en: And we know that all things work together for good to those who love God, to those who are the called according to His purpose.

text.zh: 你们若常在我里面，我的话也常在你们里面，凡你们所愿意的，祈求就给你们成就。
text.en: If you abide in Me, and My words abide in you, you will ask what you desire, and it shall be done for you.

text.zh: 我留下平安给你们，我将我的平安赐给你们。我所赐的，不像世人所赐的。你们心里不要忧愁，也不要胆怯。
text.en: Peace I leave with you, My peace I give to you; not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

text.zh: 你们得救是本乎恩，也因着信；这并不是出于自己，乃是神所赐的。
text.en: For by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God.

text.zh: 我的神必照他荣耀的丰富，在基督耶稣里使你们一切所需用的都充足。
text.en: And my God shall supply all your need according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

text.zh: 你们祈求，就给你们；寻找，就寻见；叩门，就给你们开门。
text.en: Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

text.zh: 耶和华是我的亮光，是我的拯救，我还怕谁呢？耶和华是我性命的保障，我还惧谁呢？
text.en: The LORD is my light and my salvation; Whom shall I fear? The LORD is the strength of my life; Of whom shall I be afraid?

text.zh: 我们爱，因为神先爱我们。
text.en: We love Him because He first loved us.

text.zh: 你们要彼此相爱，像我爱你们一样，这就是我的命令。
text.en: This is My commandment, that you love one another as I have loved you.

text.zh: 因为神赐给我们不是胆怯的心，乃是刚强、仁爱、谨守的心。
text.en: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.

text.zh: 你们要休息，要知道我是神！我必在外邦中被尊崇，在遍地上也被尊崇。
text.en: Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth!

text.zh: 我的恩典够你用的，因为我的能力是在人的软弱上显得完全。
text.en: My grace is sufficient for you, for My strength is made perfect in weakness.

text.zh: 你们若彼此相爱，众人因此就认出你们是我的门徒了。
text.en: By this all will know that you are My disciples, if you have love for one another.

text.zh: 我将你的话藏在心里，免得我得罪你。
text.en: Your word I have hidden in my heart, That I might not sin against You.

text.zh: 你要专心仰赖耶和华，不可倚靠自己的聪明，在你一切所行的事上都要认定他，他必指引你的路。
text.en: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

text.zh: 耶和华说：我知道我向你们所怀的意念是赐平安的意念，不是降灾祸的意念，要叫你们末后有指望。
text.en: For I know the plans I have for you,” declares the LORD, “plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.

text.zh: 不要效法这个世界，只要心意更新而变化，叫你们察验何为神的善良、纯全、可喜悦的旨意。
text.en: Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind, that you may prove what is that good and acceptable and perfect will of God.

text.zh: 我岂没有吩咐你吗？你当刚强壮胆！不要惧怕，也不要惊惶，因为你无论往哪里去，耶和华你的神必与你同在。
text.en: Have I not commanded you? Be strong and of good courage; do not be afraid, nor be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.

text.zh: 但那等候耶和华的，必从新得力。他们必如鹰展翅上腾，他们奔跑却不困倦，行走却不疲乏。
text.en: But those who wait on the LORD Shall renew their strength; They shall mount up with wings like eagles, They shall run and not be weary, They shall walk and not faint.

text.zh: 因为凡被神的灵引导的，都是神的儿子。
text.en: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God, these are sons of God.

text.zh: 圣经都是神所默示的，于教训、督责、使人归正、教导人学义都是有益的。
text.en: All Scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness.

text.zh: 凡劳苦担重担的人，可以到我这里来，我就使你们得安息。
text.en: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.

text.zh: 所以，你们要去，使万民作我的门徒，奉父、子、圣灵的名给他们施洗。
text.en: Go therefore and make disciples of all the nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit.

text.zh: 耶稣说：我就是道路、真理、生命；若不藉着我，没有人能到父那里去。
text.en: Jesus said to him, “I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through Me.

text.zh: 敬畏耶和华是智慧的开端，认识至圣者便是聪明。
text.en: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, and the knowledge of the Holy One is understanding.

text.zh: 爱是恒久忍耐，又有恩慈；爱是不嫉妒，爱是不自夸，不张狂。
text.en: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

text.zh: 所以，我们凭着信心，因耶稣基督进入现在所站的这恩典中，并且欢欢喜喜盼望神的荣耀。
text.en: Through whom also we have access by faith into this grace in which we stand, and rejoice in hope of the glory of God.

text.zh: 所以，不要为明天忧虑，因为明天自有明天的忧虑；一天的难处一天当就够了。
text.en: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about its own things. Sufficient for the day is its own trouble.

text.zh: 你们的光也当这样照在人前，叫他们看见你们的好行为，便将荣耀归给你们在天上的父。
text.en: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works and glorify your Father in heaven.

text.zh: 若有人在基督里，他就是新造的人，旧事已过，都变成新的了。
text.en: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation; old things have passed away; behold, all things have become new.

text.zh: 你要保守你心，胜过保守一切，因为一生的果效是由心发出。
text.en: Keep your heart with all diligence, For out of it spring the issues of life.

text.zh: 如今常存的有信，有望，有爱这三样，其中最大的是爱。
text.en: And now abide faith, hope, love, these three; but the greatest of these is love.

text.zh: 万军之耶和华说：不是倚靠势力，不是倚靠才能，乃是倚靠我的灵方能成事。
text.en: ‘Not by might nor by power, but by My Spirit,’ Says the LORD of hosts.

text.zh: 神是我们的避难所，是我们的力量，是我们在患难中随时的帮助。
text.en: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

text.zh: 你们是世上的盐...你们是世上的光。城造在山上是不能隐藏的。
text.en: You are the salt of the earth... You are the light of the world. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hidden.

text.zh: 信就是所望之事的实底，是未见之事的确据。
text.en: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.

text.zh: 我们不致消灭，是出于耶和华诸般的慈爱；是因他的怜悯不致断绝。每早晨，这都是新的；你的诚实极其广大！
text.en: Through the LORD’s mercies we are not consumed, because His compassions fail not. They are new every morning; great is Your faithfulness.

text.zh: 圣灵所结的果子，就是仁爱、喜乐、和平、忍耐、恩慈、良善、信实、温柔、节制。
text.en: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, self-control.

text.zh: 起初，神创造天地。
text.en: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

text.zh: 人心筹算自己的道路；惟耶和华指引他的脚步。
text.en: A man’s heart plans his way, But the LORD directs his steps.

text.zh: 总要察验何为主所喜悦的事。
text.en: Finding out what is acceptable to the Lord.

text.zh: 盗贼来，无非要偷窃，杀害，毁坏；我来了，是要叫羊得生命，并且得的更丰盛。
text.en: The thief does not come except to steal, and to kill, and to destroy. I have come that they may have life, and that they may have it more abundantly.

text.zh: 你们要将一切的忧虑卸给神，因为他顾念你们。
text.en: Casting all your care upon Him, for He cares for you.

text.zh: 因为我们行事为人是凭着信心，不是凭着眼见。
text.en: For we walk by faith, not by sight.

text.zh: 主耶和华啊，你曾用大能和伸出来的膀臂创造天地，在你没有难成的事。
text.en: ‘Ah, Lord GOD! Behold, You have made the heavens and the earth by Your great power and outstretched arm. There is nothing too hard for You.'

text.zh: 我儿，要将你的心归我；你的眼目也要喜悦我的道路。
text.en: My son, give me your heart, and let your eyes observe my ways.

text.zh: 又要彼此相顾，激发爱心，勉励行善。
text.en: And let us consider one another in order to stir up love and good works.

text.zh: 看哪，我站在门外叩门，若有听见我声音就开门的，我要进到他那里去，我与他，他与我一同坐席。
text.en: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears My voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and dine with him, and he with Me.

text.zh: 神造万物，各按其时成为美好，又将永生安置在世人心里。
text.en: He has made everything beautiful in its time. Also He has put eternity in their hearts.

text.zh: 惟有基督在我们还作罪人的时候为我们死，神的爱就在此向我们显明了。
text.en: But God demonstrates His own love toward us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

text.zh: 草必枯干，花必凋残，惟有我们神的话必永远立定。
text.en: The grass withers, the flower fades, but the word of our God stands forever.

text.zh: 你要尽心、尽性、尽力爱耶和华你的神。
text.en: You shall love the LORD your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your strength.

text.zh: 从他丰满的恩典里，我们都领受了，而且恩上加恩。
text.en: And of His fullness we have all received, and grace for grace.

text.zh: 求你指教我们怎样数算自己的日子，好叫我们得着智慧的心。
text.en: So teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.
